channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump threatens to derail Washington Commanders' new stadium deal over team name
item.description: President Trump said the Washington Commanders should change their name back to their former name, which many Indigenous people consider a slur. He th...

item.title: Forgotten 'weeds' prove a culinary hit in Kenya
item.description: Local indigenous greens grow in popularity despite a ban on farmers swapping or selling seeds.

item.title: 6/15/2025: Danger in the South China Sea; 3D Printing
item.description: First, how a Philippines, China clash could draw in the U.S. Then, 3D printing homes on Earth, someday the moon.

item.title: Japan's PM vows to stay on despite bruising election loss
item.description: The result could destabilise Japan's government at a pivotal moment in trade negotiations with the US.

item.title: Brother of Pat Tillman arrested after fiery crash into San Jose post office, USPS says
item.description: The fire happened just before 3 a.m. on the 6500 block of Crown Boulevard.

item.title: How Canada became the centre of a measles outbreak in North America
item.description: Confirmed cases of measles in Canada are nearly three times higher than in the US, despite Canada's far smaller population.

item.title: Kashmir's growing heat crisis hits health and harvests
item.description: In Indian-administered Kashmir, low rainfall and rising temperatures are putting people's livelihoods at risk.

item.title: 7/20/2025: The Vatican's Orphan's; A Tutor for Every Student; The Mezcaleros

item.title: Tom Troupe, "Mission: Impossible" and "Star Trek" actor, dies at age 97
item.description: Tom Troupe appeared in more than 70 television shows, usually in single episode roles, throughout his career.

item.title: 7/20: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Flash flooding hits Washington, D.C.; Detroit lawnmower gang still going strong after 15 years

item.title: Trump administration shuts down EPA's scientific research arm
item.description: The agency is closing the Office of Research and Development, which analyzes dangers posed by hazards including toxic chemicals, climate change, smog,...

item.title: Jake Larson, a WWII veteran who became a TikTok star as 'Papa Jake', has died at 102
item.description: Papa Jake Larson joined the US National Guard at 15 years old.

item.title: Suspect in Los Angeles car-ramming incident has a criminal history and was on parole, police say
D-Day veteran and TikTok star ‘Papa Jake’ Larson dies at 102
WW2 veteran and TikTok star 'Papa' Jake Larson dies aged 102
item.description: Tributes are being paid to the American D-Day veteran and social media star.

item.title: Suspect arrested after car crashes into post office and catches fire in San Jose, California
item.description: Authorities say a suspect was arrested after a car crashed into a post office in San Jose, California, causing the building to go up in flames.
